remarks: For a compact space, the locally finite covers are precisely the finite covers.  Sadly, this property does not properly characterize all compact spaces.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
locfincmp.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
locfincmp.2 $e |- Y = U. C $.
locfincmp $p |- ( J e. Comp -> ( C e. ( LocFin ` J ) <-> ( C e. Fin /\ X = Y ) ) ) $.
